# Introduction

I am Architt Kedia. I have been and brought up in [Hyderabad, India](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hyderabad). The city is known for its Nizam Heritage, excuisite cuisines, Spicy but delicious Biryanis, flamboyant festivals, and sprawling Tech sector.I have spent most of my early education at a local school. ### Education

I have completed my undergraduate degree of *B.Sc. Finance* from **NMIMS University, Mumbai**. 

Mumbai is my other home. I have lived there for just 3 years but truly love every aspect of the city. 

>From its abosultely stunning Skyline

>To Its Historically Significant Monuments

>TO the Food

[Mumbai](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mumbai) is also the financial capital of India and one the most expensive and fast-paced cities to live in India. That being said it is one of the most cultural diverse and historical significant city of India. It is home to a plethora of *historical monuments, cultural fests, sports events, films production, culinary delights.*  

I had an amazing time during College. I was part of several clubs. During my time at college, I have been part of many clubs. Vaayu club is the cultural fest organizing committee which hosts a 3 day event and has a footfall of 15000+ members during the fest and I was a senior member in the marketing department for the same. I was also part of the trekking club and we have completed 3 intermediate treks near Mumbai.
